test_name: ---------- addOn.usageLimits ----------
Given key value in usageLimits should throw an error when parsing addOn
---------- addOn.usageLimitsExtensions ----------
Given key value in usageLimitsExtensions should throw an error when parsing addOn
Given pricing with no createdAt should throw an error
expected_error: The createdAt field must not be null or undefined. Please ensure that the createdAt field is present and correctly formatted (as Date or string)

test_name: Given pricing with null createdAt should throw an error
expected_error: The createdAt field must not be null or undefined. Please ensure that the createdAt field is present and correctly formatted (as Date or string)

test_name: Given pricing with invalid createdAt type should throw an error
expected_error: The createdAt field must be a valid Date object or a string in a recognized date format

test_name: Given pricing with invalid createdAt format should throw an error
expected_error: The createdAt field must be a valid Date object or a string in a recognized date format

test_name: Given pricing with no currency should throw an error
Given pricing with boolean createdAt should throw an error
Given pricing invalid date in ends should throw an error
Given key value in feature should throw an error
Given key value in feature should throw an error
Given feature with no type should throw an error
---------- feature.valueType ----------
Given no valueType in feature should throw an error
Given unsupported valueType in feature should throw an error
Given boolean in features should throw an error
Given float in features should throw an error
Given integer in features should throw an error
Given list in features should throw an error
Given null in features should throw an error
Given string in features should throw an error
Given pricing with no variables and a price expression using variables should throw an error
Given expression evaluating strings should throw an error
Given boolean in plans should throw an error
Given float in plans should throw an error
Given integer in plans should throw an error
Given list in plans should throw an error
Given string in plans should throw an error
Given pricing with no saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS must have a name

test_name: Given pricing with null saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS must have a name

test_name: Given pricing with very long saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS name must have at most 50 characters

test_name: Given pricing with very short saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS name must have at least 3 characters

test_name: Given pricing with empty saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS name must not be empty

test_name: Given pricing with invalid saasName should throw an error
expected_error: The SaaS name must be a string

test_name: Given invalid starts format should throw an error
Given pricing with tag not in tags array should throw an error
expected_error: Error parsing feature feature2. Error: Error validating tag: Feature tag 'Tag 3' must be one of the values defined in 'tags'

test_name: Given boolean  in variables array should throw an error
Given pricing with no version should throw an error
expected_error: The version field of the pricing must not be null or undefined. Please ensure that the version field is present and correctly formatted

test_name: Given pricing with null version should throw an error
expected_error: The version field of the pricing must not be null or undefined. Please ensure that the version field is present and correctly formatted

test_name: Given pricing with invalid version format should throw an error
expected_error: The version field of the pricing does not follow the required structure: X.Y (being X and Y numbers). Please ensure it is a string in the format X.Y

test_name: Given pricing with invalid version type should throw an error
expected_error: The version field of the pricing does not follow the required structure: X.Y (being X and Y numbers). Please ensure it is a string in the format X.Y
